definition: to stew in soy sauce and spices

sentences.english: Open the rear cover of the headlamp and pull the installed halogen lamp out.
sentences.chinese: 打开照明灯后盖，取出原有的卤素灯泡。

sentences.english: Short Wave, Twin Tube Infrared Heaters are comparable in spectrum to, and slightly longer in wavelength than halogen lamps.
sentences.chinese: 短波，双筒红外加热器比卤素灯的频谱稍长。

sentences.english: Non-halogen, Nonhazardous, Easy to be processed, Heat resistance.
sentences.chinese: 无卤素，加工性好，热稳定性好。

sentences.english: Non-halogen resin composition, insulated electrical wire, and wire harness.
sentences.chinese: 无卤素树脂组合物，绝缘电线，和线束。

sentences.english: The first section is studies on halides-ion porous plastic optical fiber probe.
sentences.chinese: 第一节为卤素多孔塑料光纤传感探头的研究。

sentences.english: The use of halogen artillery, high brightness, long life.
sentences.chinese: 使用卤素灯炮，亮度高，寿命长。

sentences.english: Halogen lights consume relatively more energy.
sentences.chinese: 卤素灯消耗较多的能量。

sentences.english: Metal halide lamp has long life services;
sentences.chinese: 金属卤素灯，光通量大，寿命长。

sentences.english: Equipped with halogen work lamp & emergence stop button.
sentences.chinese: 配备了卤素工作灯及出现停止按钮。

sentences.english: The halogen atoms play the same scavenging role as nitrogen compounds.
sentences.chinese: 卤素原子同氮化合物一样，作为净化剂。

sentences.english: For example, you can find a complete suite of talent management software at the Halogen Software website.
sentences.chinese: 比如，你可以在卤素软件网找到一整套人才管理软件。

sentences.english: The order of pitting corrosion caused by Clx, Br and I - on iron has been interpreted.
sentences.chinese: 用电化学方法研究了卤素离子引起铁腐蚀的差异。

sentences.english: Compare this with a typical halogen light which is 1400 lumens , and you'll see the point.
sentences.chinese: 比较典型卤素光这是1400流明，你会看到这一点。

sentences.english: Complete with double ended HQI Bulb.

definition: hydrohalic acid (e.g. hydrofluoric acid HF 氫氟酸|氢氟酸[qing1 fu2 suan1], hydrochloric acid HCl 盐酸 etc)
haloalkane (obtained from hydrocarbon by substituting halogen for hydrogen, e.g. chlorobenzene or the CFCs)
electric light socket/burner (component of a kerosene lamp)/light (as a countable item, e.g. number of lights fitted in a house)
